document.full_text: sophia gimenez, a high school student from denver, writes that she has recovered sufficiently from a recent rejection to focus on her other college choices, only to come up against a financial barrier.
document.title: a new obstacle to college appears
lines_and_colors: sophia gimenez, a high school student from denver, writes that she has recovered sufficiently from a recent rejection to focus on her other college choices, only to come up against a financial barrier.
